title: Actions and Incorrect Types
description: A common programming mistake is having parameters with the wrong type. To fix this, run the program and check the errors in the output window. Then, find the mistake and correct it in the code.
hint: There is a parameter with the wrong type in this program. The action RaiseToPower accepts two integers or numbers as parameters. However, in this program one of the parameters is text. Remove the quotes from around the integer 2 and run your program.
